transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Vinod ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, sir, main Ishan baat kar raha hun aapka account manager IndiaMART head office se. Kaise hain?
Customer: Ishan ji, woh kya hai na wohi panch dhatu, plastic, carmech, glass, metal.
Executive: Ji. Wahi same leads aa rahi hai. Achcha. Iske.
Customer: Last time video meet kiya apan ne woh mapping vagera connectivity sab kuch sahi kari thi, marking sahi kari thi. Uske baad bhi koi improvement nahi hua?
Executive: Kuch nahi.
Customer: Kuch bhi nahi hua. Toh basically apan kis mein expect kar rahe hain sir? Bhagwan ji sab mein jo apne god idols hai, right?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Aur apne paas byleads aa rahi hai woh. Thik hai.
Customer: Sir, main dekh raha hun. Ha ha. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Bataiye bataiye.
Customer: Yahi aa rahi hai. Yahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Byleads nahi aa rahi hai. Toh ek second main dekh leta hun. Sir, yeh byleads main dekh raha hun ki aapne consume toh kari hai. Kuch baat hui thi kya buyer se aapki? Jo bhi bylead aapne consume kari thi?
Customer: Nahi consume kari.
Customer: Abhi abhi abhi maine subah consume ki thi ek marble Ram Darbar ki.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Marble ek aati hai, 20 mein se ek koi lead aa jati hai, aa jati hai. Nahi toh 3D wohi aa rahi hai. Jyadatar toh wohi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir, yeh aapne mujhe ek baat bataiye, Vinod ji connect kyun nahi kiya aapne? Aapka mera number aapke paas save tha, nahi tha? Main pehli baar aapko apna number de deta hun. Agar aapke paas mera number save nahi hai toh. Dusri baat, agar yeh issue face ho raha hai aapko toh aapne mujhe IndiaMART pe aap ek apni inquiry ya ek request, complaint ya concern apna raise kar sakte the. Koi baat nahi. Woh maine aapko aaj connect kar liya ya aap mujhe connect kar sakte hain yeh wale issue ke liye kyunki main ab apne ko lag raha hai ki meri aapse October mein baat hui thi toh shayad aapko leads vagera aa rahi hogi. Koi dikkat nahi hai. Main sir aapka yeh escalate kar deta hun.
Customer: Hai. Hai. Yeh bhi hai kya naam se mere ko direct kisi ki call hi nahi aati. Uspe ya toh us officer ko.
Executive: Calls bhi nahi aa rahi hai? Main dekh raha hun sir calls bhi aapke paas bilkul 0% mujhe show kar raha hai. Ek second lijiyega. Maine aapka calls ka panel khol liya. Yahan pe aapko calls bhi nahi allocate hui hai. Bas ek do call aayi hai jispe aapki 2 minute, 2.5 minute baat hui thi, right sir?
Customer: Toh yeh hona chahiye na sir.
Executive: Bilkul sir, aap bilkul sahi keh rahe ho. Yeh main aapka pehle mere ko pehle mere ko unhone bola tha woh kya naam se sticker dikha mere ko.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Sticker bhi bolte the ki aap 70,000 wala package lo. Yeh woh karwao. Fir maine yeh karwa diya toh isme bhi directly call nahi hai. Ab woh bol rahe hai ki aap Max My Ghar mein jao. Yeh toh yeh tarika nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi sir. Befikar rahiye. Main aapka jo yeh service package hai, abhi toh aapke paas package mein time hai. Abhi upgrade nahi karwayenge. Abhi yahi chalega. Jo byleads ki aapki dikkat aa rahi hai, main wohi dekh raha hun. Aap ek baar bataiye computer pe available ho ki mobile pe ho?
Customer: Sir, abhi toh main khana kha raha hun. Abhi thodi der mein.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai. Nahi nahi, main aapko online bhi connect nahi kar pa raha. Main sirf aapse yeh puchna chahunga ki jo bylead aapne purchase kari thi us pe koi response aaya jab aapki baat hui buyer ke saath?
Customer: Are buyer ke saath kya woh buyer ke saath response toh mila. Toh woh kya hai na ek toh nazdiki response hi milta hai, itna nahi hai.
Executive: Deal mature nahi ho paayi matlab baat nahi ban paayi aisi kuch?
Customer: Abhi tak koi bhi nahi ho pa rahi meri baat. Toh thoda yeh dikkat ho raha hai.
Executive: Toh basically apne ko ek toh lead nahi mil rahi aur dusra shayad pricing ka bhi thoda sa variation hoga upar neeche?
Customer: Aur ek yeh buyer ka directly call abhi tak ek bhi nahi aaya. Itne dino mein ek toh call, ek do call toh 10, 20 toh hoti hai na.
Executive: Thik hai. But aap lead manager pe leads dekhte ho? Matlab woh dekhte inquiries vagera attend karte ho jo humein chat box pe jaake type karna padta hai. Usme reply karte ho lead manager mein?
Customer: Reply nahi karta.
Executive: Reply kara kariye sir. Hum toh. Ha ha. Bataiye bataiye.
Customer: Hum toh kya whatsapp pe unko karte hain fir reply karte hain. Whatsapp pe unka number le lete hain. Baat karke woh bolte hain ki photo vagera dalo aap.
Executive: Nahi sir, photo vagera dalne ki bilkul bhi ha photo usme aap dal sakte ho kyunki unko provided rehta hai waha pe photo mangna. But yeh aapka jo location issue hai, location agar main puchun toh Alwar Rajasthan mein deal karne ki sochi aapne ya India level pe deal karenge?
Customer: Nahi India level pe karte hain.
Executive: India level pe karte hain na sir? Toh mere khayal se isse behtar toh aapka offline mein bhi business chal raha hoga. Offline mein kaise chal raha hai sir abhi agar puchun toh main?
Customer: Offline bhi nahi hai abhi toh.
Executive: Offline mein nahi hai. Toh sir main ek baar yeh concern aapka dekh raha hun. Yeh koi dikkat nahi hai. Aap abhi aaram se khana kha lijiye. Main aapko zyada pareshan nahi karunga. But main yeh puchna chahunga ki yeh aapke paas international byleads aa rahi hai. USA ki hai, UAE ki hai. Yeh kya chakkar hai?
Customer: International ka toh mera hai hi nahi.
Executive: Hai hi nahi? Mujhe aisa laga ki sir aapne international koi package le rakha hai aapke paas USA aur UAE ki byleads aayi hui hai.
Customer: Aise toh aati hai sabke paas par lekin maine nahi liya yeh package.
Executive: Nahi liya aur aapne sir nau products apne inactive rakhe hue hain. Marble god statue, white marble aap.
Customer: Woh woh woh aap kar dijiye. Aapki taraf se aap jo banta hai na kijiye help meri.
Executive: Main bilkul karunga sir. Ha.
Executive: Woh main bilkul bilkul aapki help karunga aur isko main aapka concern ko apne jo mere senior manager hai main unko raise kar raha hun. Unke paas yeh case jayega. Yeh sara catalog. Ha bilkul sir main aapko byleads provide karata hun because main ho sakta hai shayad IndiaMART pe bylead nahi hai kya issue aa raha hai jiski wajah se aapko bylead nahi mil pa rahi hai. Main sir aapko connect karta hun.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: Milti milti toh hai lekin yeh mil rahi hai other.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul thik sir bilkul yeh sir itna kam flow nahi hota. Aap bhi hamare precious client ho aur bhi hamare clients hai. Sir achi khasi byleads aati hai IndiaMART pe buyers ke clients ke paas.
Customer: Pehle toh aati thi lekin ab kya hua?
Executive: Ab bilkul nahi aa rahi. Main nahi wohi aur woh baat dusri hai ki correct woh baat dusri hai ki suppliers kaun kaun si bylead choose karte hain, purchase karte hain woh unpe depend karta hai. Par byleads ka flow acha khasa hota hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Main aapko sir bilkul bilkul nahi ho raha aur main aapko sir aadhe ghante mein connect karta hun with some improvement and some effective response ki ispe kya kiya ja sakta hai. Thik hai sir? Aap main aapko apna number bhi whatsapp kar dunga isi pe aap save kar lena mera. Koi issue hota hai toh aap mere second number pe mujhse connect kariye IndiaMART se alag. Right? Okay Vinod ji. Thik hai. Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving enough relevant buyleads.

- Lack of direct calls from potential buyers.

- Dissatisfied with current subscription package.

- International buyleads are showing, but not subscribed.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to escalate the issue.

- Executive will connect in 30 minutes with improvements.

- Executive offered to provide his direct contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect in 30 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer support, escalation
